item.description: Note - this is a rescheduling of the December 21st meeting! DNN is an excellent platform for delivering a professional websites, but as with any other framework, proper care and feeding is not to be neglected. Over the years, we have collected tips and tricks from the design, development, site maintenance and hosting aspects of working with DotNetNuke that have become very useful on a day-to-day basis, and sometimes critical over the long haul. And in this talk, Iâ€™ll share these best practices with you. Join us!
item.name: DNN Boston User Group
